svg.text: Learning Phase - Every Quarter Builds Knowledge for AI Templates
THE FIRST CYCLE: WHERE THEORY MEETS REALITY
Everything takes 50% longer than planned, but each quarter teaches valuable lessons
MCP server captures every pattern, decision, and workaround for future automation
Weeks 37-48: First Real-World Testing with New System
‚Ä¢ Users kept reverting to old methods
Immediate Improvements Between Q1 and Q2
Weeks 49-60: Expanding Scope with Improved Processes
Clear Evidence of Platform Value & AI Learning
External Audit Success & Foundation for Scale
FIRST CYCLE LEARNING SUMMARY: THE FOUNDATION IS SET
‚Ä¢ AI learning exceeded expectations - templates became highly accurate
‚Ä¢ User adoption accelerated once benefits became clear
‚Ä¢ Change management required constant attention throughout
‚Ä¢ External auditor education took significant time and patience
‚Ä¢ Executive sponsorship never wavered ‚Ä¢ Team remained dedicated
‚Ä¢ Iterative improvement approach allowed course corrections
FIRST IMPLEMENTATION COMPLETE: 72 WEEKS (18 MONTHS) TOTAL
36 weeks foundation + 36 weeks first cycle = Ready for rapid scaling
Next implementation will leverage all templates and learnings - estimated 16-20 weeks total
